participant_1.background:
I'm usually too busy with school work to keep up with my family, but I try my best.
my hobbies are sleeping and playing the guitar.
i am going to school to get my bachelors degree.
I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around.
it s great fun.

participant_2.background:
I'm not the type to fight but I've had to defend myself a few times.
My dog has been my best companion since we got her.
when people do not like my social media posts , it upsets me.
I go to Comic Con and play with animals in my free time.
my major was american literature and education.

content.text: Hey! Hows your day going so far?
Going good! Just got back from comic con, it was a blast!
Comic con sounds fun! I've always wanted to go. What was your favorite part of the con?
My favorite part was getting to meet all the amazing artists and authors. It was really inspiring!
That sounds awesome! What are some of your favorite books?
I love anything by Neil Gaiman, Terry Pratchett, and Stephen King.
I love Neil Gaiman! I've read American Gods and The Graveyard Book. They were both so good!
I love those books too! I also really enjoyed Anansi Boys.
I've heard good things about that one, I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a great read.
What are some of your favorite things to do in your free time?
I love to read, write, and play with my dog.
That sounds fun! I love to read and write too. I don't have a dog, but I love playing with my cat.
Cats are great! I've always wanted one, but I'm allergic.
That's too bad! They're really good pets.
Yeah, I've heard they're very affectionate.
They are! My cat is always cuddling with me.
That sounds adorable!
Yeah, he's the best.
I'm glad you have a good pet to keep you company.
Thanks! I'm glad too
